panels.description: Particulate counts displayed in log scale

targets.query:
import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pc10_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.log10(x: r._value + 1.0) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.log10(x: r._value + 1.0) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Particulate Size Distribution

targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BME280V3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TMP117")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPSGPGGA2" or r["_measurement"] == "GPSGPRMC2" or  r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitudeCoordinate" or r["_field"] == "longitudeCoordinate" or r["_field"] == "speedOverGround" or r["_field"] == "trueCourse"  or r["_field"] == "${PM}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPSGPRMC2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speedOverGround")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

title: MASK - Mints Automobile Sensing Kit V2
